price: Wala wewe huwaombi ujira kwa haya. Hayakuwa haya ila ni mawaidha kwa walimwengu wote.
arabic: وَمَا تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Wala hatukusudii kwa hadithi za uwongofu unazo waeleza kuwa ndio upate malipo au manufaa. Ikiwa hawaongoki hawa usiwahuzunikie. Mwenyezi Mungu atawaongoa watu wengineo. Kwani Sisi hatukuwateremshia wao tu peke yao. Na haya si chochote ila ni mawaidha, na mazingatio kwa kila aliye umbwa na Mwenyezi Mungu katika mbingu na ardhi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā tasaluhum ʿalayhi min ajrin in huwa illā dhik'run lil'ʿālamīna
